scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n API,WEB -c cyan,green "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: rimraf backend/dist frontend/dist node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules
